titleStmt.title: An epitaph, on the death of the late most reuerend Father in God, Iohn: by his prouidence the Arch-Byshop of Canterburie his Grace. &c. Made to runne vpon the letters of his names and tytles. &c. His Grace deceased at Lambeth in the yeere of his age 72. Februarie 29. 1603. And his funerall rightes were kept at Croyden the 27. of March following. 1604.
titleStmt.author: Rhodes, John, minister of Enborne, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: By W. White, dwelling in Cow-lane neere Smith-fielde,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: I.R., i.e. John Rhodes?--Cf. STC.
John .. Arch-byshop of Canterburie = John Whitgift.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
